comment.author: 96374002@N00
comment._content: Fascinating to see all these Norwegian scenes in American colours. It gives it all a strange glow of the Grand Canyon.

comment.author: 33238939@N02
comment._content: These pictures are amazing. Makes you realize even more what we are about to lose..

comment.author: 34275825@N05
comment._content: The correct spelling is Tyssestrengene (meaning the Tysse Strings, where Tysse refers to the catchment area). These beautiful "strings" (about 300 meters free fall) are part of a large hydroelectric power scheme and are sadly no longer to be seen.

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: Thanks!  We'll fix the spelling  in the source data and reload description.

comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called World Waterfall Database, and we'd love to have this added to the group!
